alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:26AM CDT until March 26 at 5:48AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Amory For the Tombigbee River...including Amory...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Lowland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 21.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
